bruschetta.name: Bruschetta
bruschetta.description: Grilled bread topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

capreseSalad.description: Sliced tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

hummusPlate.name: Hummus Plate
hummusPlate.description: Creamy hummus served with pita bread and vegetable sticks.

deviledEggs.name: Deviled Eggs
deviledEggs.description: Hard-boiled eggs filled with a creamy mustard-mayo mix.

prosciuttoMelon.name: Prosciutto & Melon
prosciuttoMelon.description: Sweet cantaloupe wrapped in salty prosciutto slices.

cheesePlatter.name: Cheese Platter
cheesePlatter.description: A selection of local and imported cheeses, nuts, and fruits.

mozzarellaSticks.name: Mozzarella Sticks
mozzarellaSticks.description: Breaded and fried mozzarella cheese served with marinara sauce.

chickenWings.name: Chicken Wings
chickenWings.description: Crispy wings tossed in your choice of sauce.

springRolls.name: Spring Rolls
springRolls.description: Crispy rolls filled with mixed vegetables and served with dipping sauce.

stuffedMushrooms.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
stuffedMushrooms.description: Mushrooms filled with garlic, herbs, and cheese.

friedCalamari.name: Fried Calamari
friedCalamari.description: Crispy squid rings served with lemon and aioli.

miniEmpanadas.name: Mini Empanadas
miniEmpanadas.description: Pastries filled with spiced beef and vegetables.

patatasBravas.name: Patatas Bravas
patatasBravas.description: Fried potatoes served with spicy tomato sauce and aioli.

garlicShrimp.name: Gambas al Ajillo
garlicShrimp.description: Shrimp sautéed in garlic and olive oil.

chorizoBites.name: Chorizo Bites
chorizoBites.description: Spicy Spanish sausage slices grilled and served hot.

manchegoOlives.name: Manchego & Olives
manchegoOlives.description: Cubes of Manchego cheese with marinated olives.

tunaTartare.name: Tuna Tartare
tunaTartare.description: Raw tuna with avocado and soy-lime dressing.

tzatziki.name: Tzatziki
tzatziki.description: Greek yogurt dip with cucumber and garlic.

babaGhanoush.name: Baba Ghanoush
babaGhanoush.description: Smoky eggplant dip served with warm pita.

spinachArtichoke.name: Spinach & Artichoke Dip
spinachArtichoke.description: Creamy hot dip with spinach, artichoke, and cheese.

guacamole.description: Fresh avocado mash with lime, onion, and tomato.

trioDip.name: Trio Dip Platter
trioDip.description: Selection of hummus, tzatziki, and roasted red pepper spread.
